sentences.english: Sana is a authoress of Daur who began her writing in early 1990's.
sentences.chinese: 薩娜是於九十年代初走上文壇的達斡爾族當代女作家。

sentences.english: The term "New Generation" refers to the last group of writers in the late 20 th century Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 新生代是二十世紀末中國文壇最後一個作家羣。

sentences.english: Pan Yue was one of the most important representative writers in the Western Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 潘岳是西晉文壇上具有代表性的作家。

sentences.english: He was widely considered one of the greatest short-story writers in world literature.
sentences.chinese: 在世界文壇，他被廣泛譽爲最偉大的短篇小說家之一。

sentences.english: Liu Xinglong, is a unique writer in the contemporary literary world.
sentences.chinese: 作家劉醒龍在當代文壇是比較獨特的一位。

sentences.english: The Hemingwayian tough man spirit lightens the literary arena in the whole world in an era.
sentences.chinese: 海明威式的硬漢精神照亮了一個時代的世界文壇。

sentences.english: Her poetic interpretation of life and ontology of being is her greatest contribution to the modern prose.
sentences.chinese: 張曉風以其獨特的詩性解釋散文在臺灣文壇獨樹一幟。

sentences.english: The value and meaning of female consciousness in Li Chis novels in literary circles.
sentences.chinese: 池莉小說的女性意識對文壇的價值和意義。

sentences.english: Jia Pingwa is one of the most famous prose writers with artistic talent and characteristics in the modern literary world.
sentences.chinese: 賈平凹是當代文壇最具藝術才華與特點的散文家。

sentences.english: The Pi Rixiu's essay made the special contribution in the development of later Tang dynasty literature.
sentences.chinese: 皮日休的雜文創作對晚唐文壇發展有着特殊的貢獻。

sentences.english: Shenzhou was a very important figure in the literary world of Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 沈周是明代文壇上的重要人物。

sentences.english: Zhang-wei is an important and distinctive writer in contemporary literary area.
sentences.chinese: 在當代文壇上，張煒是一位重要而獨具特色的作家。

sentences.english: Content: In the Wan-li times' literary world of the Ming Dynasty, Li Wei-zhenwas characteristic of special status.
sentences.chinese: 在明萬曆年間的文壇上，李維楨有着獨特的地位。

sentences.english: The literary circles of U. S also introduced Lao She.
sentences.chinese: 對於老舍本人，美國文壇也作了具有針對性的介紹。

sentences.english: Given the added poets, we would like to speculate once more upon the literary circles in the Liang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 某些詩人的補入能夠引發我們對梁代文壇的重新思考。

sentences.english: Zhang Chengzhi in the literary significance beyond itself a writer.
sentences.chinese: 張承志在文壇的意義超越了一個作家本身。

definition: the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
the New Culture Movement (mid-1910s and 1920s), intellectual revolution against Confucianism aiming to introduce Western elements, especially democracy and science
